argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description:
.T. = Records were added.
.F. = Records were not added.

argument.name: Number_of_records
argument.description: The integer number of records to add.

page.discussion: The <TBL>.ADD_BLANK_RECORDS() method adds Num_Records of blank records to a table.

section.description: This script adds 1,000 blank records to a table.
section.example: dim t as P t = table.open("test") t.add_blank_records(1000)
